prompt.content: Calculate Stride's (ticker: LRN) EV/Operating Income multiple for fiscal year 2025 using their latest 10-K filing. Assume share price = $130 and F/D S/O = 50 million. Show answer as a number (multiple) rounded to 1 decimal.

rubrics.name: Income from operations (located in Income Statement)= $360.094 million.

messages.content: Income from operations (located in Income Statement)= $360.094 million.

rubrics.name: Long-term debt (located in Balance Sheet)= $416.322 million.

messages.content: Long-term debt (located in Balance Sheet)= $416.322 million.

rubrics.name: Current portion of finance lease liability (located in Balance Sheet) = $42.316 million.

messages.content: Current portion of finance lease liability (located in Balance Sheet) = $42.316 million.

rubrics.name: Long-term finance lease liability (located in Balance Sheet) = $44.567 million.

messages.content: Long-term finance lease liability (located in Balance Sheet) = $44.567 million.

rubrics.name: Cash and cash equivalents (located in Balance Sheet) = $782.497 million.

messages.content: Cash and cash equivalents (located in Balance Sheet) = $782.497 million.

rubrics.name: Marketable Securities (located in Balance Sheet) = $202.769 million.

messages.content: Marketable Securities (located in Balance Sheet) = $202.769 million.

rubrics.name: Equity value (Using stated in the promt assumptions) = Share Price × F/D/S/O = $130 × 50,000,000 = $6,500,000,000.

messages.content: Equity value (Using stated in the promt assumptions) = Share Price × F/D/S/O = $130 × 50,000,000 = $6,500,000,000.

rubrics.name: Enterprise value (EV) = Market Cap + Long-term debt + Current portion of finance lease liability + Long-term finance lease liability - Cash and cash equivalents - Marketable Securities = $6,017,939,000.

messages.content: Enterprise value (EV) = Market Cap + Long-term debt + Current portion of finance lease liability + Long-term finance lease liability - Cash and cash equivalents - Marketable Securities = $6,017,939,000.
